item.title: Neural network system verilog
item.description: I am doing a neural network on SystemVerilog from scratch Architecture Code Simulation Future work I am doing a neural network on SystemVerilog from scratch It have been near 4 years since I first touched Hardware Languages on the beggining I used VHDL. At the start I didn’t really like the syntax but when I started working with It givving lessons for undergraduate students I got some confident on it.
